entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

Application Description

All in one app for an Interactive Map, Loot locations, Material list and breakdown list, Enemy drop list, guides and quest-line guides. - Interactive Maps - Sort and Filter - Event Timers and Notifications - Guides for Quests Guides and Maps are partially available for free, but a Pro membership is required to access all content Raiders Map is the best tool for easy access to everything, along with world class support. You can reach me directly on X for help or to report any issues: All4nDev, or through discord. Not affiliated with embark. Raiders Map is independently owned and managed. apple standard EULA https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

entry.title: MagicKit Pro: AI Smart Toolbox
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$3.99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ $3.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

Application Description

MagicKit AI is a complete utility app designed to help you monitor your device, optimize performance, and access everyday tools from one convenient interface. Built specifically for iOS, MagicKit AI brings together essential features while maintaining your privacy and battery life. Device and System Tools ‚Ä¢ Battery Status: View current charge level and charging state ‚Ä¢ Storage Usage: Analyze available and used storage ‚Ä¢ Device Info: Check basic hardware and system details ‚Ä¢ Uptime Tracker: Monitor how long your device has been running ‚Ä¢ Battery Tips: Get practical advice to improve battery usage ‚Ä¢ Photo Cleaner: Detect and remove duplicate or similar photos to free up space ‚Ä¢ Contact Cleaner: Organize contacts by finding duplicates and incomplete entries ‚Ä¢ RAM Manager: Monitor memory usage and optimize performance ‚Ä¢ Device Benchmark: Test CPU, GPU, memory, and network performance Network Tools ‚Ä¢ Speed Test: Measure internet connection speed ‚Ä¢ Wi-Fi Info: See network name, IP address, and connection status ‚Ä¢ IP Lookup: Check geolocation of public IP addresses ‚Ä¢ Location Info: Track GPS location, speed, direction, and altitude Security & Privacy Tools ‚Ä¢ Password Generator: Create strong, secure passwords with customizable options ‚Ä¢ Passphrase Generator: Generate memorable and secure passphrases ‚Ä¢ UUID Generator: Create unique identifiers in various formats ‚Ä¢ Secure PIN Generator: Generate secure PIN codes with multiple options ‚Ä¢ Temporary Email: Create disposable email addresses for privacy protection Utility Tools ‚Ä¢ Unit Converter: Convert between different measurements ‚Ä¢ Currency & Crypto Converter: Get live exchange rates for fiat and cryptocurrencies ‚Ä¢ Date Time Calculator: Calculate differences between dates with business days support ‚Ä¢ Time Zone Converter: Convert time across various time zones with live updates and DST status ‚Ä¢ Countdown & Reminders: Create beautiful countdowns with customizable reminders and recurring events ‚Ä¢ Magic Counter: Track multiple counters with detailed statistics and streaks ‚Ä¢ QR Scanner: Scan QR codes instantly ‚Ä¢ Document & Card Scanner: Capture and save high-quality document scans with AI-powered text recognition ‚Ä¢ Compass and Level: Measure direction and level using device sensors ‚Ä¢ Orientation Lock: Lock screen orientation while using the app ‚Ä¢ Audio Meter: Measure surrounding sound levels using the microphone ‚Ä¢ Clipboard Manager: Access and manage copied text within the app session ‚Ä¢ Flashlight & Brightness: Turn on the device flashlight and adjust screen brightness ‚Ä¢ Note Taker: Create, organize, and manage notes with categories and iCloud backup ‚Ä¢ Universal Generator: Generate random data including text, numbers, dates, and more ‚Ä¢ Color Palettes Studio: Create, extract, and manage beautiful color palettes from images or manually using color pickers ‚Äî perfect for designers and creatives Highlights ‚Ä¢ Clean and user-friendly interface with new wizard-based tools ‚Ä¢ Featured Tools section showcasing the most popular utilities ‚Ä¢ No ads or in-app purchases ‚Ä¢ Lightweight and battery-efficient ‚Ä¢ Compatible with all iOS devices ‚Ä¢ Frequent updates with new tools ‚Ä¢ Built with privacy and performance in mind ‚Ä¢ Dark/Light theme support with smooth animations Perfect for ‚Ä¢ Device monitoring and optimization ‚Ä¢ Everyday measurement and conversion tasks ‚Ä¢ Scanning documents and QR codes ‚Ä¢ Cleaning up photo storage and contacts ‚Ä¢ Creating and managing countdowns with reminders ‚Ä¢ Tracking habits and progress with multiple counters ‚Ä¢ Accessing quick tools like flashlight and brightness control ‚Ä¢ Performing simple network diagnostics ‚Ä¢ Generating secure passwords and managing privacy ‚Ä¢ Taking quick notes and organizing information ‚Ä¢ Designing and managing color palettes for creative projects Download MagicKit AI today and simplify your daily tasks with one smart, powerful toolkit.

entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$14.99 ‚Üí $9.99 [$9.99 ~ $14.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$9.99

Application Description

A game where you run a sweets shop with the popular manga character Doraemon. Let's make Doraemon's favorite dorayaki and create a store that will be the talk of the town. First, make the sweets, set up the shelves, prepare the tables, and get ready to run the shop! In addition, various characters from Fujiko„ÉªF„ÉªFujio's works will appear as customers! Many characters will come, including [T„ÉªP BON] and [Kiteretsu Encyclopedia]. During your adventure to find ingredients, you will encounter many difficulties. Even in such a situation, Doraemon's secret gadgets will help you solve difficult problems without any difficulty! A management game created by Kairosoft, a company popular for its simulation games. Enjoy Doraemon's unique adventures.

  • Âπ¥Â∫¶‰ºöÂëòÔºö$3.99

Application Description

Walden is an App focused on personal management, carefully designed to bring users only a quality experience, hope you like it. Function Introduction To-Do List Integrate the four quadrants of work, according to the priority of the task rational scheduling. Support repeat schedule and reminders. Pomodoro Walden's built-in tomato clock is designed strictly according to the tomato work method You can set daily tomato clock goals, rest time, and select the tasks to focus on from the to-do list Progress Management Quantify your goals, support goal grouping and progress notes, with a simple and beautiful progress bar, clearly track your goal progress. Flash Notes Integrate custom tags, support full-text search and display by tags. In our daily life, there will always be a moment of light and whimsy, it can be the emotion after reading a text, it can be the resonance of listening to a song, or simply want to record the moment's thoughts. If you are like me and want to practice writing long articles, then you can start by writing a paragraph every day and gradually improve your writing skills day by day. ----------------- Subscription Instructions --Subscription period: 1 month, 1 year (non-automatic renewal, please feel free to purchase) -- Payment: Payment will be deducted through the user's iTunes account, and payment will be made once the user confirms the purchase. --User Terms: http://freelancer-x.com/app-terms/ -- Privacy Policy: http://freelancer-x.com/app-privacy-policy/

entry.title: MyTracks: GPS Recorder
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$0.99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ $0.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • Lifetime PremiumÔºö$9.99
  • 300 Altitude Query TimesÔºö$3.99
  • 100 Altitude Query TimesÔºö$2.99

Application Description

MyTracks is an app that helps you keep track of your location using GPS data. It's perfect for various activities like hiking, running, walking, biking, and more. This app uses advanced technology to provide precise measurements and calculations. Here's what you can do with MyTracks: - Track your route: Whether you're hiking, running, or cycling, MyTracks can record your path and show it on a map. - Save favorite locations: If there are specific places you want to remember, you can mark them as favorites in the app. - Import and export data: MyTracks allows you to import and export data in various formats such as CSV, GPX, KML, and KMZ. - Improve accuracy: You can take static GPS observations to get more accurate waypoints for your tracks. - Easy navigation: The app provides a waypoint guide on the compass, making it easy for you to navigate to specific locations. - Customizable waypoints: You can add waypoints manually or import them from your favorite locations. You can even add vectors with angle and distance. - Coordinate conversion: MyTracks allows you to convert between four different coordinate formats (Decimal, DMS, MGRS, UTM) at any time. - Additional features: The app displays glide ratio during recording, offers compass options in degrees or mils, supports MGRS Grid overlay on the map, and allows you to create routes to follow before starting your track. - Detailed records: You can view your tracks on a map and replay the route. The app provides detailed statistics about your track and displays the saved waypoints associated with each track. You can also change the color of your tracks for easier identification. Please note that using GPS continuously in the background can drain your device's battery quickly. If you have any feedback or questions, please feel free to contact us at miaozhi.ai@gmail.com

entry.title: Knight & Dragon III
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$1.99 ‚Üí $0.99 [$0.99 ~ $3.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$0.99

Application Description

Rare Items! Class Change! And an epic story. The third installment of the full-fledged hack-and-slash RPG "Knight and Dragon," packed with replayability! "Knight and Dragon 3" is the third installment in the hack-and-slash RPG series set in a medieval fantasy world. One morning, after receiving a certificate from an elderly gentleman, proving you as a full-fledged guild member, you are sent to a small village in the Republic of Gringard. This is where the story begins. Various incidents occurring in the Republic, the conflicts with the neighboring Lindahl Empire, and the story of knights and dragons will eventually involve you in a grand destiny revolving around the stars. [Features of Knight and Dragon 3] ‚ñΩ The basic systems of a replayable RPG such as intense real-time battles, rare item drops, and class changes are inherited from the previous game! ‚ñΩ Real-time battles are now more interactive, allowing you to dodge, parry, and counter by reading the enemy‚Äôs attack timings! ‚ñΩ A variety of weapons like axes, spears, and halberds appear among the items! Additionally, you can create characters to your liking, including dual-wielding and two-handed weapons! ‚ñΩ A world map that enhances the epic story is introduced! The story, with even more volume than the previous game, and the end content are still going strong! ‚ñΩ Moreover, in this game, a diverse range of NPCs with unique characteristics, place names, city names, and other proper nouns depict the grand story! ‚ñΩ Other features such as party dispatch and the Persona function, which were well received in the previous game, are of course continued! „Éª„Éª„Éª For those who want to get a feel for the game before purchasing, the previous game "Knight and Dragon" is completely free to enjoy, so please give it a try. Official Homepage http://dgjam.com/knightdragon3

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: Titan Quest: Legendary Edition
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$19.99 ‚Üí $9.99 [$9.99 ~ $19.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$9.99

In-App Purchases

  • Ragnar√∂k for free downloadÔºö$0.00
  • Atlantis for free downloadÔºö$0.00
  • Eternal Embers DLCÔºö$4.99

Application Description

Titan Quest has captivated legions of players since its 2006 debut. You get the all-encompassing experience of an unbridled, truly heroic journey through the worlds of Titan Quest! Your honorable quest is to save the world! The gods alone cannot defeat the Titans, so real heroes are needed - and that can only be you! Your success or failure will decide the fate of the people and the Olympians! With your custom-created hero, scour the mystical and ancient worlds of Greece, Egypt, Babylon, and China. Conquer the hordes of legendary creatures and master various weapons and martial arts: Archery, sword fighting, or the use of powerful magic! Travel a world of antiquity and Nordic mythology! Battle the beasts of mythology as you travel to the Parthenon, the Great Pyramids, the Hanging Gardens of Babylon, the Great Wall, the Tartarus Arena, and other famous places. Encounter the greatest villains of Greek mythology, discover the uncharted lands of northern Europe, search for the mythical kingdom of Atlantis, and set out on a journey across the western Mediterranean. It‚Äôs all or nothing on your glorious path! With each challenge that awaits you, you'll have to defeat bigger and stronger enemies until you reach your goal and force the Titans to their knees! Rush into battle alongside brave pet companions! Find extraordinary items with special powers that will enhance your abilities and help you on your path. Legendary swords, powerful lightning spells, magical, bows and numerous other treasures with unimaginable powers await you - all of them are at your disposal in your battles and spread fear and terror among the hideous creatures! What are you waiting for? Like no other game in the Action RPG genre, Titan Quest: Legendary Edition combines the fascinating world of mythology with endless and exciting action that you would expect from such a compelling game! Features: + Within the world of the Immortal Throne DLC, you‚Äôll encounter the greatest villains of Greek mythology, brave the attacks of Cerberus, and hazard the banks of the River Styx. You have to interpret the prophecies of the blind seer Tiresias, fight alongside Agamemnon and Achilles, and use the wiles of Odysseus to conquer this dark new adventure. + In the uncharted lands of northern Europe in the Ragnar√∂k DLC, you‚Äôll brave the realms of the Celts, the Northmen, and the Asgardian gods! + Meet an explorer in the Atlantis DLC, in search of the mythical kingdom of Atlantis. A key is supposedly hidden in the diary of Herakles, which is rumored to be located in the Phoenician City of Gadir. Set out on a journey across the western Mediterranean, including the Tartarus Arena for epic battles! + All important updates have been implemented to the technically overhauled Titan Quest to grant the best gaming experience of this classic ever! + ETERNAL EMBERS DLCs available as in-app purchase - Summoned by the legendary Emperor Yao, the Hero is called back into the East to deal with a demonic threat that has been ravaging the land after the Telkine was slain. ! A note for all players who own the base version of Titan Quest: The DLCs mentioned here are also available for purchase as additional content so that all fans can upgrade their game to fully enjoy all expansions! ¬© www.handy-games.com GmbH

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Dawncaster: Deckbuilding RPG
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$4.99 ‚Üí $1.99 [$1.99 ~ $4.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$1.99

In-App Purchases

  • Vaul of the Void Promo PackÔºö$0.00
  • Siege of ShadowsÔºö$4.99
  • Dawncaster Mega BundleÔºö$12.99

  • Dawncaster Origins BundleÔºö$4.99

Application Description

Dawncaster: Epic Deck-Building Adventure Dive into a world of strategy and magic in Dawncaster, the ultimate deck-building experience with over 900 stunning hand-illustrated cards. Will you become a shadow-dancing rogue, an indomitable warrior, a mysterious Seeker, or forge your own path? Unravel the dark secrets of Aethos in this tactical masterpiece that revolutionizes mobile card gaming. Redefining Card Games - Experience groundbreaking mechanics that seasoned players will love - Blend unique class abilities with powerful weapons and enchantments - Master an innovative energy system, freeing you from traditional deckbuilder constraints A World Shrouded in Mystery - Embark on a quest to find the legendary 'Dawnbringer' lost in the corrupted realm of Umbris - Immerse yourself in a richly illustrated world with compelling dialogue and meaningful choices - Shape the fate of a desperate world through your actions Complete Gaming Experience - Unlock all cards and classes with your purchase - no microtransactions! - Open up new exciting area's with optional expansion packs for even more content - Enjoy a premium game free from ads, timers, or pay-to-win mechanics Endless Replayability - Every run is unique with randomized encounters and battles - Unlock new starting cards, portraits, and challenges - Test your skills with increasing difficulty levels Join the Dawncaster Community - Connect with fellow players and developers on the Discord server - Share strategies, get the latest updates, and influence the game's future - Be part of a passionate community that's shaping the future of Dawncaster Ready to answer the call? Download Dawncaster now and begin your legendary journey! Discord: https://discord.gg/pfeMG9c Website: https://dawncaster.wanderlost.games

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: 60 Seconds! Reatomized
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$3.99 ‚Üí $1.99 [$1.99 ~ $3.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$1.99

Application Description

Dolores, Ted, Mary Jane and Timmy return to face the nuclear apocalypse in this new, remastered edition of the classic atomic adventure - 60 Seconds! Reatomized, featuring high resolution art support, refreshed 2D graphics and hand-drawn 3D textures, new interactive menu, improved UI system, a technical refresh, and of course... new content! NEW GAMEPLAY MODE Survival Challenges - unique, short storylines which will put your survival skills to the test! NEW OPPORTUNITIES to escape the wasteland in form of a storyline spanning across multiple playthroughs! Can you escape the wasteland in style? NEW RELATIONSHIP SYSTEM more stories and crazy interactions between the McDoodle family members! NEW SOUNDS, ART AND UNLOCKABLE VISUAL CONTENT allowing you to add a little color to your fallout shelter! NEW ACHIEVEMENTS! With only 60 seconds left to impact, go on a mad dash through the house in search of family members and useful supplies. Everything will be against you: time, your very own furniture, a house that's different every time you play, and the fundamental question... what to take with you and who to leave behind? Reaching the fallout shelter in time, alive, is only the beginning. Whatever you scavenged and whoever you saved will play a vital role in your survival. Each survival story will be different, with every day surprising you with unexpected events. Will all of these stories end well? It's up to you. Ration food and water, make best use of your supplies, face difficult choices and even venture into the wasteland. Good luck.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Brotato:Premium
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$4.99 ‚Üí $3.49 [$3.49 ~ $4.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$3.49

In-App Purchases

  • Abyssal TerrorsÔºö$2.99
  • Abyssal Terrors 01Ôºö$2.99

Application Description

A top-down arena shooter roguelite where you play a potato wielding up to 6 weapons at a time to fight off hordes of aliens. Choose from a variety of traits and items to create unique builds and survive until help arrives. The sole survivor: Brotato, the only potato capable of handling 6 weapons at the same time. Waiting to be rescued by his mates, Brotato must survive in this hostile environment. Features ¬∑ Auto-firing weapons by default with a manual aiming option Fast runs (under 30 minutes) ¬∑ Dozens of characters available to customize your runs (one-handed, crazy, lucky, mage and many more) ¬∑ Hundreds of items and weapons to choose from (flamethrowers, SMGs, rocket launchers or sticks and stones) ¬∑ Survive waves lasting 20 to 90 seconds each and kill off as many aliens as you can during that time ¬∑ Collect materials to gain experience and get items from the shop between waves of enemies ¬∑ Accessibility options: tweak the health, damage and speed of enemies so the difficulty is right for you *Cloud storage is only available while online. You can play offline, but your data will not be saved to the cloud. Please take note of this. „ÄêContact Us„Äë YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCtaSitbjWjhnlzuX2ZLjtUg DiscordÔºö@Erabit or join via https://discord.gg/P6vekfhc46 TwitterÔºö@erabit_studios Tik TokÔºöhttps://www.tiktok.com/@brotato_mobile FacebookÔºö@Brotato(facebook.com/brotatomobile) Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/brotato_mobile/ Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/brotato_mobile/ EmailÔºösupport@erabitstudios.com

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad
